alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 1:41PM EST until February 20 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Racine Lock affecting Meigs and Mason Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River At Racine Lock. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 38.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 41.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 41.0 feet on 04/15/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at midnight.
